doc:
David Field (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Field_(actor) 0 David Field is an Australian character actor and film director who has appeared in numerous film and television roles, including Chopper, Two Hands and Gettin' Square. In 2009, Field made his directorial debut with The Combination. He is also known for his role in advertisements for Oak as part of the Hungry/Thirsty campaign and as the ex prison inmate uncle in the mini series 'A Moody Christmas'. David_Field is an_Australian_character_actor_and_film_director who has_appeared in numerous_film_and_television_roles , including Chopper , Two_Hands and Gettin '_Square . In 2009 , Field made his_directorial_debut with The_Combination .
